downloadDescription: The Microsoft HPC Pack 2012 R2 Update 3 SDK is designed to provide the tools and content necessary to write parallel applications for the HPC Pack platform.
detailsSection:
The Microsoft HPC Pack 2012 R2 Update 3 SDK is designed to provide the tools and content necessary to write parallel applications for the HPC Pack platform.
The Development Kit consists of several components:
  • Required: The Microsoft HPC Pack 2012 SDK core package can be used to write client applications that interact with the HPC Pack job scheduler. Install this from sdk_x64.msi or sdk_x86.msi. You will also need to install the HPC Pack 2012 R2 Update 3 Client Utilities, which are available through the full HPC Pack 2012 R2 Update 3 installer or through the Client Utilities redistributable package available in the related downloads.
    • Files: sdk_x64.msi, sdk_x86.msi
systemRequirementsSection: Minimum Hardware Required: At least one industry standard personal computer (either 32-bit or 64-bit) with at least 128MB RAM.
installInstructionSection:
1) Download the appropriate SDK msi installer(s) to your workstation based on processor architecture, run it, and the installer will walk you through the setup process.
2) If you are developing applications that interact with the HPC Pack job scheduler, you will also need to install the HPC Pack 2012 R2 Update 3 Client utilities.

relatedResourcesSection.title: hpc Pack 2012 R2 Update 3 Client Utilities
